column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Be Yourself and Impress Others
#Text=You may not know , but you should always be yourself , even when you 're trying to impress everyone .
#Text=This can be hanging out with many people or dressing to show who you are .
#Text=Need some help ?
#Text=Read below on how to do so .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Create yourself !
#Text=You may not know who you are , what you like , what you want to do in life , but this is okay .
#Text=Create yourself , do n't find yourself , create yourself .
#Text=Create your own personality , but be yourself .
#Text=Creating your personality does n't mean copying others , but you can always get influence .
#Text=Have confidence , a good sense of style and a contagious smile .
#Text=Dress to impress .
#Text=Bring out who you are in your own fashion sense .
#Text=Do n't throw on an outfit everyday -- spend time on how you want to bring out yourself in each outfit .
#Text=Remain who you are .
#Text=You may change , and always will , but you will always be yourself .
#Text=Know that if you are being yourself , and someone does n't like you , they 're not right .
#Text=Ignore them and know that there are many other people you can impress , you do n't need to impress anyone .
#Text=Be yourself , everyone 's going to get judged anyway , sometime in their life .
#Text=Find the real friends .
#Text=Do n't use someone as a friend just to act popular .
#Text=This is very common .
#Text=Find the real friends , the ones that you think will really be there for you , and not your popularity .
#Text=Try making as many friends as possible .
#Text=Smile at everyone , compliment them , and start talking to them more .
#Text=Once this happens , you may have a sleepover or hang out sometime , this can lead to a whole new friendship .
#Text=Do what you like , and only you .
#Text=Do n't do drugs to be cool and do n't be someone you 're not to fit in .
#Text=Nobody can make you do anything , and you are your own person .
#Text=Nobody can own you , and never let them .
#Text=Never be shy .
#Text=This will make some people think you 're sad , and others may think you have a low self esteem .
#Text=Smile at people , keep your chin up and be friendly .
#Text=Be confident .
#Text=Have great posture and do what you want .
#Text=Do n't be shy and never bully someone .
#Text=Find your talents and make it shine .
#Text=Acting ? Dancing ?
#Text=Whatever it is , perform , take classes or join clubs .
#Text=Find something to make new friends and impress people that way .
#Text=You are finished !
#Text=Remember that if you do have more friends , or impressed more people , know to stay who you are .
#Text=Never judge people and know that even if you are trying to impress everyone , not everyone may be impressed , they 're not worth it .
#Text=You are .
#Text=So , have confidence , keep your head up and smile .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Know that not everyone will love you , and that 's okay .
#Text=Never change for someone .
#Text=Keep your true friends .
#Text=Remain who you are .
#Text=Do n't act like you 're the best , but have confidence .
#Text=Do n't try too hard to become a different person .
#Text=Find who is worth it .
